name: Clock App
description: A visually stunning clock application with real-time transitions between day and night modes based on the current time. Features a user-friendly and dynamic interface built with React Native and Expo.

name: Blooming Elegance
description: A full-stack flower shop management application where users can browse, edit, and delete products. Built with a modern tech stack and responsive design for an enhanced user experience.

name: Currency Flatlist
description: A React Native application featuring a currency converter and a tic-tac-toe game. Uses flatlist components and personalized images for a polished look.

name: Password Generator
description: A secure and customizable password generator built with React Native and TypeScript. Features a sleek UI and generates strong passwords with ease.

name: Monthly Budget
description: A simple HTML and CSS project for managing monthly budgets. Provides a clean UI for entering expenses and calculating totals.

name: Convention Center
description: A visually appealing website for a convention center, showcasing its facilities and services. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Demo Front Page
description: A beautifully designed landing page created with HTML and CSS, demonstrating a modern and responsive layout.

name: Weather App
description: A weather application leveraging APIs to fetch real-time weather data. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a seamless user experience.

name: Pin Matcher
description: A secure PIN generator and verification tool. Allows users to create and validate 4-digit PINs with ease.

name: Shopping Cart
description: An interactive shopping cart system that enables users to manage items, adjust quantities, and view real-time price updates. Built with modern web technologies.

name: Baap er Bank
description: A banking application showcasing deposit and withdrawal functionality with real-time updates. Built using APIs for data management.

name: Panda Commerce
description: A dummy e-commerce page built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, showcasing a modern and responsive design.

name: Influencer Gear
description: A product showcase website for influencer gear, featuring dynamic content and a user-friendly layout. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Amajon Shopping Cart
description: A dummy shopping cart page showcasing interactive features like item management and price calculation, built with modern web technologies.
